attributes.action: disolve Parliament and initiate a General Election NOW.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In light of the corrupt and criminal activities are our 'elected' MPs, it is ESSENTIAL that Parliament is disolved and a General Election called NOW.  If Brown, Cameron & Clegg believe they public will support them, PROVE IT at the ballot box!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
